title: Qualifications of incorporators
context: ยง421-3 Qualifications of incorporators. Three or more adult persons, engaged in agriculture as bona fide producers of agricultural products, or two or more associations of such producers, may form an association under this chapter. [L 1949, c 234, pt of ยง1; RL 1955, ยง176-3; HRS ยง421-3]
